channel.title: How do you change a 525 clients ip server it connects to?
channel.description: Like how do you change the ip a 525 clieint connects too because I decided to make a 525, but I need a 525 client and I dont know how too make the 525 client connect to my server! Help me pleasssse :eek:

item.title: How do you change a 525 clients ip server it connects to?
item.dc:creator: @Phineas Phineas
item.description:
@Phineas wrote:

[quote=“bonzakid, post:2, topic:274379”]There are tutorials
but;
You need a 525 server aswell as the 525 client,
you cant just connect to your standard 317 from a 525 client to make it like fullscreen HD
you need the actual source to.
There are ways to set it up on the tutorial section.
500+ servers are also very unstable and hard to run![/quote]I have a 525 server too -.- please jussssrt tell me how to connect =[

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change a 525 clients ip server it connects to?
